CentOS_7 openup2u-client-2.5.4-2762

Run the following shell commands to trust the repository.

sudo rpm --import https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/CentOS_7/repodata/repomd.xml.key

Run the following shell commands to add the repository and install from there. You either need 'dnf upgrade' or 'dnf install' depending on whether you already have an older version installed or not.

sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/CentOS_7/ownbrander:Qt5121:openuptwou.repo
sudo dnf clean all
sudo dnf install openup2u-client
sudo dnf upgrade openup2u-client

Download packages manually (without adding a repo)


CentOS_6 openup2u-client-2.5.4-2762

Run the following shell commands to trust the repository.

sudo rpm --import https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/CentOS_6/repodata/repomd.xml.key

Run the following shell commands to add the repository and install from there. You either need 'yum upgrade' or 'yum install' depending on whether you already have an older version installed or not.

sudo wget https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/CentOS_6/ownbrander:Qt5121:openuptwou.repo -O /etc/yum.repos.d/ownbrander:Qt5121:openuptwou.repo
sudo yum clean all
sudo yum install openup2u-client
sudo yum upgrade openup2u-client

Download packages manually (without adding a repo)


Debian_9.0 openup2u-client-2.5.4+oc-2761

Add (at least temporarily) a download repository. This requires registering trusted key. (More information). Run the following shell commands to trust the repository:

wget -nv https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/Debian_9.0/Release.key -O - | sudo apt-key add -

Run the following shell commands to add the repository and install from there.

echo 'deb https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/Debian_9.0/ /' | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/owncloud.list
sudo apt update
sudo apt install openup2u-client

Download packages manually (without adding a repo)

openSUSE_Leap_42.3 openup2u-client-2.5.4-2762

Run the following shell commands to trust the repository.

sudo rpm --import https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/openSUSE_Leap_42.3/repodata/repomd.xml.key

Run the following shell commands to add the repository and install from there.

sudo zypper addrepo https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/openSUSE_Leap_42.3/ownbrander:Qt5121:openuptwou.repo
sudo zypper refresh
sudo zypper install openup2u-client

Download packages manually (without adding a repo)
